text: For he has forsaken his people the house of Israel, because their land is filled as at the beginning with divinations, as the land of the 2. 6 Or, aliens, see Appendix which has: “ISAIAH 2. 6. — Philistines. The LXX. generally render by Φιλιστεὶμ or Φυλιστιὶμ till about the middle of Judges, after which the word almost always used is ἀλλόφυλοι. In this there was probably some accommodation of sound to tense.Philistines, and many strange children were born to them.
